FoodItemData.name: Steak and Kidney Pie
FoodItemData.description: Tender cubes of steak, with tender lamb kidney is succulent rich gravy.  Served with a side of mashed potatoes and peas.

FoodItemData.name: Toad in the Hole
FoodItemData.description: Plump British Pork sausages backed in a light batter.  Served with mixed vegetables and a brown onion gravy.

FoodItemData.name: Ploughmanâ€™s Salad
FoodItemData.description: Pork Pie, Pickled Onions, Pickled relish Stilton and Cheddar cheeses and crusty French bread.

FoodItemData.name: Fish and Chips
FoodItemData.description: A large piece of Cod in a covered in a light crisp batter, recipe is a family secret, with a side of Chips and Mushy Peas.  Scraps available by request at no  extra charge.

FoodItemData.name: Fish and Chips
FoodItemData.description: A smaller portion of our Dinner version

FoodItemData.name: Traditional English Breakfast
FoodItemData.description: The breakfast of champions.  2 Fried eggs, 1 English pork sausage, 1 Back Bacon, 2 pieces of black pudding, baked beans, and 1 slice of fried bread.  Served with Brown Sauce

FoodItemData.name: Irish Breakfast
FoodItemData.description: The Irish version of the English breakfast.  2 Fried eggs, 1 Irish pork sausage, 1 rasher, 1 piece of black pudding, 1 piece of white pudding, baked beans, and Irish soda bread.

FoodItemData.name: Sausage Roll
FoodItemData.description: English sausage meat wrapped in a flakey pastry. Served with Brown Sauce

FoodItemData.name: Scotch Egg
FoodItemData.description: A hard-boiled egg, wrapped in pork sausage meat.  Covered in breadcrumbs and deep-fried.  Served cold with a side of picked relish.

FoodItemData.name: Prawn Cocktail Flavoured Crisps
FoodItemData.description: The classic exotic crisp flavour.

FoodItemData.name: Cheese and Onion Flavoured Crisps
FoodItemData.description: Mum's favourite.

FoodItemData.name: Spotted Dick
FoodItemData.description: The Classic Desert.  Steamed suet pudding with currents covered in custard

FoodItemData.name: Eton Mess
FoodItemData.description: Favourite of the old Boys.  A mixture of strawberries, pieces of meringue and cream.  Old school tie not included!

FoodItemData.name: Jam Roly-Poly
FoodItemData.description: Strawberry Jam rolled up in a suet pudding.  Served  with Custard

FoodItemData.name: Chip Butty
FoodItemData.description: A soft white roll, slathered with butter and filled with Chips fresh out of the fryer

FoodItemData.name: Pickled Onions
FoodItemData.description: Golf ball sized onions pickled in vinegar and assorted spices.  These onions bite back

FoodItemData.name: Pickled Eggs
FoodItemData.description: Large hard-boiled eggs pickled in vinegar and assorted spices.  These onions bite back

FoodItemData.name: Cracklin
FoodItemData.description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

FoodItemData.name: Lancashire Hotpot
FoodItemData.description: The famous English Lamb and Mutton stew. Tender succulent pieces of Lamb and Mutton topped with sliced potatoes, slow roasted in the oven.

FoodItemData.name: Faggots

FoodItemData.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
FoodItemData.description: Britain new national dish.  Chunks of roasted chicken in a mildly spicy Masala sauce.  Served with Basmati rice

FoodItemData.name: Glazed Doughnut
FoodItemData.description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar glaze.

FoodItemData.name: Jelly Doughnut
FoodItemData.description: Deep fried pastry covered in sugar, and filled with strawberry jelly.

FoodItemData.name: Hamburger

FoodItemData.name: Meatloaf and Mashed Potatoes

FoodItemData.name: Pazooki

FoodItemData.name: Pot Roast
FoodItemData.description: Beef with vegetables slow cooked for a minimum of 8 hours

FoodItemData.name: Southern Fried Chicken with Waffle
FoodItemData.description: Southern fried chicken, savoury waffles and smokey maple syrup

FoodItemData.name: Pork Rinds
FoodItemData.description: Salted and roasted pork fat and skin.

FoodItemData.name: Bacon Wrapped Hot Dog
FoodItemData.description: Take one hot dog, wrap it in bacon and cook until the bacon is nice and crisp.  Then place it in the bun.

FoodItemData.name: Hushpuppies

FoodItemData.name: Biscuits and Gravy

FoodItemData.name: Grilled Cheese and Ham

FoodItemData.name: Jambalaya
